page.title: 07Mollington Village Hall #2
page.content: The Hall which is Charities Trust property was built during the late 1960's,by voluntary labour and local fundraising.It is run and maintained by a voluntary Executive Committee made up of members from all the using groups and depends on the Schools usage by Education funding and local groups. The North Banbury Scout Group,a major user of the Hall with a membership of 85 in the four training sections (Beavers,Cubs,Scouts and Venture Scouts),decided in 1984 to build an Equipment DEN at the side of the Hall.This would house all their training equipment and enhance the Groups working facilities.The Â£4000 was raised by donation,job activity and Council Grants with the DEN being completed and handed over to the TRUST on 2nd November 1985.
